
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut)
target_compile_options(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  llvm12-lib-IR
  lib-ExecutionEngine-MCJIT
  llvm12-lib-Linker
  lib-Target-X86
  Target-X86-AsmParser
  Target-X86-Disassembler
  lib-Transforms-IPO
  lib-Transforms-ObjCARC
  lib-ExecutionEngine-PerfJITEvents
  minikql-codegen-llvm
  library-cpp-resource
)
target_link_options(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)
target_sources(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/codegen_ut.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/0b1e661a9b035d2bcc841f470b8538fb.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
copy_file(
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/codegen_ut.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/codegen_ut.cpp
)
add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_optimized.12.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_merged.12.bc
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMOPT}
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_merged.12.bc
  -o
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_optimized.12.bc
  -internalize-public-api-list=fib#sum_sqr#sum_sqr2#sum_sqr_128#sum_sqr_128_ir#str_size
  -passes="default<O2>,globalopt,globaldce,internalize"
)
add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_merged.12.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.12.bc
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMLINK}
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp.12.bc
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.12.bc
  -o
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_merged.12.bc
)
add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.12.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMAS}
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll
  -o
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.12.bc
)
copy_file(
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/codegen_ut_llvm_deps.h.txt
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/codegen_ut_llvm_deps.h
)
llvm_compile_cxx(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp.12.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)
llvm_compile_cxx(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp.12.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)
llvm_compile_cxx(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp.12.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp.12.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)
llvm_compile_cxx(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp.12.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)
resources(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/0b1e661a9b035d2bcc841f470b8538fb.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm/ut/Funcs_optimized.12.bc
  KEYS
  /llvm_bc/Funcs
)
target_allocator(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)
vcs_info(contrib-ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm-ut)
